hero.title: Connecting Talent with {{opportunity}}
hero.description: Noretmy is more than a marketplace; it's a global community where creativity meets demand, and where the best digital services are just a click away.

mission.label: Trusted globally
mission.sublabel: Serving clients and freelancers in over 80 countries.
mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To provide a seamless, secure, and rewarding environment where businesses can find the expertise they need to thrive, and freelancers can build fulfilling careers doing what they love.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To be the world's most trusted destination for digital services, known for our commitment to quality, transparency, and the success of our global community.

values.title: Our Core Values
values.subtitle: The principles that guide everything we do at Noretmy.

excellence.title: Excellence
excellence.description: We strive for the highest quality in every service offered on our platform.

security.title: Security
security.description: Your transactions and data are protected by industry-leading security standards.

community.title: Community
community.description: We build lasting relationships between talented freelancers and visionary businesses.

cta.title: Ready to join our community?
cta.description: Whether you're looking to hire or want to offer your services, Noretmy is the place to be.
